body:
Lets fucking goooooo !!! Cleo! Cleo! Cleo!
Thank you Hexel!!! Looooove this tooo much !
Lets go Cleo simp !
A dragalia doujin huh….now THAT is quite rare.

ty hexel, i can see the effort you put in your work,
this fap is for you!!
Definitely gonna Support my mans hexel for the quality content next paycheck for sure

>artist posting on his own upload

kinda based ngl

Hello guys, Hexel here, the artist of Cleo In Heat. First of all, I would like to thank you for reading my doujin and glad if you guys enjoyed it. I'm not that disappointed that now my doujin is here rather I feel quite happy tbh. I hope you guys support it by buying it at Gumroad or Pixiv Fanbox so I can continue making doujin like this and more Dragalia content. Thank you so much!

Gumroad :
